thread.title: Kansas City Royals vs. Houston Astros ALDS Game 3 live score: Stream, TV schedule, where to watch
thread.title_full: Kansas City Royals vs. Houston Astros ALDS Game 3 live score: Stream, TV schedule, where to watch

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: Kansas City Royals vs. Houston Astros ALDS Game 3 live score: Stream, TV schedule, where to watch
text:
Comments 
The Houston Astros host their first real postseason game in ages as the Kansas City Royals come to town for Game 3 of the ALDS. 
Get live scoring updates as well as live stream and TV broadcast info for the Kansas City Royals-Houston Astros ALDS Game 3. You can also get live scoring updates in the box score above. Game info 
Start Time : 4:00 p.m. EST Location : Kauffman Stadium TV Broadcast 
Network : Fox Sports 1 Channel : Click here to check out Fox Sports 1's channel finder to find your local channel. Live Stream 
With the MLB postseason moving to national broadcasts, it's easier to get ahead of an online broadcast. Even the official MLB option is more reasonable. 
Fox Sports 1 has a solid streaming service for desktop and mobile. It's free for cable subscribers, which may make things a little tricky for folks who cut the cord. 
MLB.tv Postseason Package - A package from the league that lets you catch postseason games streaming on your computer and other devices. May not include all ALCS/NLCS games. 
Fox Sports Go (or Fox Sports Go mobile app ) - Fox carries a pretty good streaming service for national games -- free for cable subscribers. 
--- 
The Astros will have their ace Dallas Keuchel taking the mound as the series shifts back to Houston for Game 3. On the other side, the Royals will have Edinson Volquez taking the mound.
